title: Question About Usage of a Laptop Power Cord
body: When gaming with a laptop should you leave the power cord in the laptop and plugged to an outlet so you don't have to worry about losing battery while playing LoL or something? Or should you only ever use the cord when the laptop is low battery?

replies.body:
Gaming laptops aren't known to have the best battery life, so I would recommend keeping it plugged in during play. Not only will you ensure you won't run out of juice in the middle of a teamfight, but you'll also ensure your PC is running on Maximum Performance. Most laptops are tuned from the factory to run on lower performance when on battery unless you've configured it to do otherwise.

Let me know if you have any questions.
